author: Varsha Babuji
content: American entrepreneur and trader, Arturo Pestana, gives his wife Amirah Ibrahim a monthly shopping allowance of Rs 8 lakh and treats her to a "princess lifestyle". He has banned her from doing regular jobs or any other household chores. "I do everything for her and always will, she's never going to want for anything...," said Pestana.
title: Man gifts wife Rs 8 lakh monthly, bans her from doing chores

author: Farida
content: Traveler X criticized Vistara for lacking non-vegetarian meal options on a short-distance flight. Vistara defended its policy, citing time constraints for efficient service delivery. The exchange sparked a social media debate, with users divided on the airline's decision. X's tweet gained significant traction, reflecting widespread interest in in-flight dining experiences.
title: Passenger Upset Over Vistara’s Short Flight ,No Non-Veg Policy

author: The Hawk Editor
content: Union Cabinet greenlights Rs 300 subsidy extension for PM Ujjwala Yojana till 2024-25, ensuring direct financial aid to beneficiaries. Total expenditure set at Rs.12,000 crore, reaffirming commitment to clean cooking fuel accessibility. Piyush Goyal announces decision ahead of International Women's Day, amplifying support for women's empowerment.
title: Cabinet approves Rs 300 subsidy extension for PM Ujjwala Yojana

author: FPJ Online Edit
content: England young spinner Shoaib Bashir gave a fiery send-off to Team India batter Yashasvi Jaiswal on Day 1 of the 5th Test in Dharamshala. The incident took place in the 21st over of India's batting when Jaiswal ran down the track to hit a big shot off Shoaib Bashir but missed the ball and Ben Foakes stumped the batter.
title: Video: Shoaib Bashir gives fiery send-off to Yashasvi Jaiswal

author: Namya Sinha
content: Taylor Swift and Emily Dickinson, are related. They are, "sixth cousins, three times removed." This revelation was made by the website Ancestry. According to findings, both Swift (born 1989) and Emily (born 1830) are descended from the same 17th century English immigrant. The early settler of Windsor, Conn., was Taylor's s ninth great-grandfather and Dickinson’s sixth great-grandfather.
title: Taylor Swift is related to 19th century poet Emily Dickinson!

author: Shreyansh Jain
content: These quotes showcase the wisdom and resilience of remarkable women throughout history.These quotes offer a source of inspiration and empowerment, reminding us of the strength and courage within us all. Let these words uplift you and fuel your journey towards greatness. These quotes serve as a beacon of light, guiding us to embrace our power and potential as strong individuals.
title: Strong women quotes to inspire and empower you

author: Namya Sinha
content: Do you believe in nazar or the evil eye? The ladies of the Ambani clan were dressed in the most stunning and expensive jewelry pieces for pre-wedding functions of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant. Radhika's Versace gown and Ishan Ambani's couture gowns got talked about. However, some people even noticed a black string or kala dhaga tied around their wrist.
title: Ambani Women ward off 'buri nazar' with  black thread

author: FPJ Online Edit
content: Afghanistan cricketer Noor Ali Zadran announced his retirement from international cricket on Thursday, March 7. Ali Zadran's last appearance in international cricket was in a one-off Test match against Ireland, where he opened the batting with his nephew Ibrahim for Afghanistan. ACB confirmed Zadran's retirement from cricket in the international arena via Tweet on X handle (formerly Twitter).
title: Afghan batter Noor Ali Zadran retires from international cricket

author: The Hawk Editor
content: The Supreme Court seeks records on the plea by Uddhav Thackeray's faction to disqualify Eknath Shinde's MLAs, including the CM, amid the Shiv Sena split. The court has set an April 8 hearing, questioning the petition's maintainability and the legitimacy of Shinde's government following the Election Commission's decision favoring his faction.
title: Sena clash: SC will hear plea, seeks records for April 8 hearing

author: The Hawk Editor
content: In Telangana, a toddler died and four were injured when a water tanker collided with a car in Rangareddy. Separately, a 23-year-old sepoy and athlete died in Narsingi after being hit by a ready-mix concrete vehicle. Both incidents have raised serious concerns about road safety and call for immediate action to prevent further tragedies.
title: Tragedy strikes Telangana: Toddler dead, 4 injured in Rangareddy
